Description: A 16 digit unique user identifier number; constructed from registration date, registration iso numeric country code, and uid.
The registered user firstname.
The registered user lastname.
The date the user registered on.
The user registered country code of residence.
A unique incremental id for the user.
The domain of the registered user email address.
The hashed device id the user used in the transaction.
The device type of the hashed device id the user used in the transaction.
The hashed card id the user used in the transaction.
The card type of the hashed card id the user used in the transaction.
The card country code of the hashed card id the user used in the transaction.
The hashed ip address the user used in the transaction.
The ip address country code of the hashed ip address the user used in the transaction.
The hashed application id the transaction relates to.
The hashed id of the transaction.
The date of the transaction.
The transaction amount.
The payment method used to complete the transaction; one of ['card', 'wallet', 'points']
The payment channel the user used to complete the transaction; one of ['paypal', 'adyen', 'worldpay', 'docomo'].
The status of the transaction; one of ['successful', 'pending',  'rejected'].
The associated error code if the transaction was rejected; one of ['E900:ConnectionTimeout', 'E901:SuspectedFraud', 'E902:AuthenicationFailure', 'E903:UserCancelled', 'E904:InsufficientFunds'].
